name: Webcamoid
summary: Take photos and record videos with your webcam
description:
webcamoid allows one to capture, save and view a video stream. It also can do a lot of funny things.

Features:

* Take pictures and record videos with the webcam. * Manages multiple webcams. * GUI interface. * Custom controls for each webcam. * Add funny effects to the webcam. * +60 effects available. * Effects with live previews. * Translated to many languages. * Use custom network and local files as capture devices. * Capture from desktop. * Many recording formats. * Virtual webcam support for feeding other programs.
